# AniMc

> A free, open-source Minecraft profile picture generator

## About

AniMc is a web application that allows users to create custom Minecraft profile pictures with various effects and gradients.

## Features

- Generate profile pictures from Minecraft usernames
- Custom gradient backgrounds
- Upload custom backgrounds
- No watermarks
- 100% free

## Tech Stack

- SvelteKit
- TypeScript
- SCSS
- Vercel

## Links

- Website: https://ani-mc.vercel.app
- GitHub: https://github.com/devrock07/AniMc
